text: Kandi ingamiya (zitangwaho ibitambo) twazibashyiriyeho nk’imwemu migenzo ya Allah mufitemo ibyiza byinshi (amafunguro,ibihembo ku munsi w’imperuka). Bityo, (igihe mugiye kuzibaga)mujye muzivugiraho izina rya Allahigihe ziziritse (zigiye kubagwa), maze nizigwa hasi (nyuma yo kuzibaga), mujye muzikuraho (inyama) muzirye, munaziheho abakene badasaba ndetse n’abasabirizi. Uko ni ko twategetse (ayo matungo) kubacirabugufi kugira ngo mushimire
